Packagecom.yahoo.astra.fl.charts.skins
Classpublic class RectangleSkin
InheritanceRectangleSkin fl.core.UIComponent
ImplementsIProgrammaticSkin

A skin shaped like a rectangle with customizable color and alpha properties for its fill and border.
